entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
